knimeNode.name: Empty Column Checker
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to test if all cells in a column are empty

intro.p: This node tests whether all cells in one or more columns are empty. Collection cells fail if they have no members, or all members are missing cells. A column containing only empty cells will fail the test

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com
